author: Rekha Mistry
method: Boil the peas in a pan of lightly salted water for 2-3 minutes, or until tender. Drain well, then rinse under cold running water. Roughly crush half the peas and blend the remaining into a smooth purée using a hand-held blender. Mix the crushed and pureed peas together in a bowl, then stir in the tahini, lime juice, cumin and salt, to taste. Stir in the coriander and spring onions. Serve with vegetable crisps or tortilla chips.
ingredients: 200g/7oz fresh peas,  2 tbsp tahini,  1-2 tbsp freshly squeezed lime juice,  ¼ tsp ground cumin,  pinch salt, or to taste,  2 tbsp chopped fresh coriander ,  1-2 spring onions, trimmed, finely chopped,  vegetable crisps or tortilla chips, to serve
